text: Thank you @user & @user for meeting today to discuss efforts to lower Rx drug costs.I was proud to advance my legislation to get lower-cost drugs to market faster through @user keep working to help NH families afford the medications they need. http

As the daughter of a WWII veteran & POW advocating for NH men & women in uniform is personal to me.I'm proud to help advance a slate of bipartisan legislation to support our servicemembers & will continue to bring the voices of our veterans to Congress. http http

Today I was proud to join my fellow Granite Staters and @user at the NH Veterans Cemetary in Boscawen to pay tribute to all the brave servicemembers who died serving our country.This #MemorialDay and every day we remember their sacrifice and honor their memory. http
Today on #MemorialDay we honor the brave men and women in uniform who made the ultimate sacrifice in defense of our country.These heroes will never be forgotten. http
